abstract: Racehorse Jess’s Dream wins Saratoga Race Course, his career debut competition.
lead_paragraph: The horse, the first foal out of the 2009 horse of the year, Rachel Alexandra, swept past six rivals to win in a mile and an eighth.

headline.main: Jess’s Dream Aces His Debut at Saratoga

snippet: The horse, the first foal out of the 2009 horse of the year, Rachel Alexandra, swept past six rivals to win in a mile and an eighth.
